# A nearby stone resource patch has been identified with the following details:
# - Name: Stone
# - Size: 28,947
# - Bounding Box: 
#   - Left Top: (x=-20.5, y=-20.5)
#   - Right Bottom: (x=-10.5, y=26.0)
#   - Center: (x=-15.5, y=2.75)
#
# I will now move to the center of this stone resource patch and attempt to harvest some stone to proceed with crafting the Stone Furnace.

# Moving to the center of the stone resource patch to begin harvesting.
move_to(Position(x=-15.5, y=2.75))  # Move to the center of the stone resource patch.
